meanings.definition: Below the minimum level or amount.
meanings.sent1: The student's effort was subminimal, barely meeting the basic requirements.
meanings.sent2: Her subminimal income made it difficult to afford even the most essential items.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at catching the mouse was subminimal, resulting in a playful chase instead.
meanings.sent4: The impact of his words was subminimal, barely registering with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The subminimal light in the room made it hard to see anything clearly.

meanings.definition: Less than the smallest possible amount.
meanings.sent1: The subminimal amount of sugar in the recipe made the cookies taste bland.
meanings.sent2: His subminimal contribution to the project was barely noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The subminimal number of guests at the party made it feel intimate and cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was running at a subminimal level, ready to snap at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The subminimal rainfall resulted in dry, cracked soil in the garden.
